Best Free Teleprompter Tools for 2025

In 2025, downloading a bulky app just to scroll some text feels archaic. The best teleprompter tools are now instant, web-based, and powered by AI voice recognition.

The Problem with Traditional Apps

Most "free" teleprompter apps in the App Store follow a frustrating pattern:

  • They watermark your video.
  • They limit your script length.
  • They lock "Mirror Mode" behind a paywall.
  • They require a manual remote or awkward scroll speed adjustments.

The Rise of Voice-Activated Web Apps

Modern tools like VoicePrompter have changed the game by running directly in your browser (Chrome, Safari, Edge) while offering features that used to cost $20/month.

Key Features to Look For:

1. Voice Recognition
The text should scroll automatically as you speak. No remote needed.
2. Offline Capability (PWA)
It should work even if your internet cuts out during a shoot.
3. Mirror Mode
Essential if you are using a professional beam-splitter glass kit.
4. Privacy First
Your script should stay on your device, not be uploaded to a cloud server.

Why VoicePrompter Stands Out

We built VoicePrompter to solve these exact issues for solo creators. It's completely free, open-source, and runs locally on your device.

Whether you are on an iPad, an Android phone, or a Windows laptop, you just open the URL and start recording. No logins, no paywalls, no watermarks.
